GameType.description: The default gamemode for the world.

GeneratorType.description: The generator which is being used for new chunks.

LevelName.description: The name of the level shown when on the world selection screen.

RandomSeed.description: The seed used to generate the world.

SpawnX.description: The X location to use when spawning players.

SpawnY.description: The Y location to use when spawning players.

SpawnZ.description: The Z location to use when spawning players.

Time.description: The current time in the world in ticks.

hardcore.description: Enable Hardcore mode for this world.

MapFeatures.description: Whether generated structures are enabled for world generation.

initialized.description: Whether this world has been initialized.

bonusChestEnabled.description: Whether a bonus chest is enabled for the world.

bonusChestSpawned.description: Whether the bonus chest has already spawned.

spawnMobs.description: Whether mobs are allowed to spawn.

NetherScale.description: The scale of the nether compared with overworld

BorderCenterX.description: The center X co-ordinate of the world border.

BorderCenterZ.description: The center Z co-ordinate of the world border.

BorderDamagePerBlock.description: The amount of damage the world border will do when it moves in 1 block.

BorderSafeZone.description: The radius of the world border safe-zone.

BorderSize.description: The radius of the world border.

BorderSizeLerpTarget.description: The new size of the world border to transition to.

BorderSizeLerpTime.description: The amount of time left in the world border's movement in milliseconds.

BorderWarningBlocks.description: The distance which the players will begin to see a visual warning of the world border.

BorderWarningTime.description: The amount of time before the player will see a visual warning (seconds).

commandblockoutput.description: Whether command blocks should output in the chat to online operators.

commandblocksenabled.description: Whether command blocks should be enabled for this world.

commandsEnabled.description: Whether commands/cheats are enabled for this world.

dodaylightcycle.description: Whether the time of day should cycle, when disabled the time will stay the same.

doentitydrops.description: Whether entities should drop items when they are killed.

dofiretick.description: Whether fire should spread, if disabled fire will not spread.

doimmediaterespawn.description: Whether respawning should immediately happen otherwise the respawn screen will be shown.

doinsomnia.description: Whether phantoms can spawn in the nighttime.

domobloot.description: Whether entities should drop items when they are killed.

domobspawning.description: Whether mobs should spawn naturally in the world.

dotiledrops.description: Whether blocks should drop items when broken.

doweathercycle.description: Whether the weather should cycle, if disabled there will be no weather in the world.

doLimitedCrafting.description: Whether players should only be able to craft recipes that they've unlocked.

drowningdamage.description: Whether drowning damage is enabled in the world.

falldamage.description: Whether fall damage is enabled in the world.

firedamage.description: Whether fire damage is enabled in the world.

ForceGameType.description: Whether the default gamemode for the world should be enforced on all players.

functioncommandlimit.description: The number of commands which can be used in a function file.

keepinventory.description: Whether the inventory should be kept when a player dies.

mobgriefing.description: Whether mobs are allowed to grief the world.

naturalgeneration.description: Whether players can regenerate health naturally if hunger is full.

randomtickspeed.description: The tickspeed to use for the game, 0 disables ticking.

sendcommandfeedback.description: Whether commands should output in the chat to online operators.

showcoordinates.description: Whether co-ordinates should be accessible to the client.

showdeathmessages.description: Whether death messages should be shown in the chat.

tntexplodes.description: Whether TNT can explode when lit.

announceAdvancements.description: Whether getting an advancement should be shown in the chat.

disableElytraMovementCheck.description: Whether advanced movement checks should be disabled for elytra.

logAdminCommands.description: Whether admin commands should be logged to the server log.

reducedDebugInfo.description: Whether the debug screen (F3) shows reduced information.

spectatorsGenerateChunks.description: Whether spectators cause new chunks to be generated.

spawnradius.description: The radius used for picking a location from the Spawn X, Y, Z

maxEntityCramming.description: The maximum number of entities in one block before taking damage.

maxCommandChainLength.description: The maximum amount of chain command blocks which can be run from a another command block.

gameLoopFunction.description: The function to call from the Minecraft game loop.

ConfirmedPlatformLockedContent.description: Whether this content is platform locked.

hasBeenLoadedInCreative.description: Whether the map has been loaded in creative before.

hasLockedBehaviorPack.description: Whether the behaviour pack is locked.

hasLockedResourcePack.description: Whether the resource pack is locked.

immutableWorld.description: Indicates whether the world can be modified.

isFromLockedTemplate.description: Whether the map was created from a locked template.

isFromWorldTemplate.description: Whether the map was created from a world template.

isWorldTemplateOptionLocked.description: Whether the world template option is locked.

LimitedWorldOriginX.description: Legacy, used to indicate where limited world generation started.

LimitedWorldOriginY.description: Legacy, used to indicate where limited world generation started.

LimitedWorldOriginZ.description: Legacy, used to indicate where limited world generation started.

MultiplayerGame.description: Whether this is a multiplayer game.

texturePacksRequired.description: Whether texture packs are required for the map.

XBLBroadcastIntent.description: Xbox broadcast range, 1 for invitation, 2 for friends and 3 for friends of friends.

DifficultyLocked.description: Whether the difficulty for this world can be modified by the client.

lightningLevel.description: Determines how heavy the lightning is.

lightningTime.description: The number of ticks until lightning will be triggered.

rainLevel.description: Determines how heavy the rainfall is.

rainTime.description: The number of ticks until raining will be triggered.

raining.description: Whether it is raining in the world.

thundering.description: Whether is is thundering in the world.

thunderTime.description: The number of ticks until thundering will be triggered.

clearWeatherTime.description: The number of ticks until clear weather will be triggered.

DayTime.description: The current time of day, 0 is sunrise, 6000 is mid day, 12000 is sunset

CenterMapsToOrigin.description: Whether maps should be centered to the origin of the map.

educationFeaturesEnabled.description: Whether this map has education features enabled.

eduLevel.description: The level of the EDU features to use.

prid.description: The product id for this map.

serverChunkTickRange.description: The number of chunks to tick server-side.

startWithMapEnabled.description: Whether new players start with a map.

worldStartCount.description: The number of times the world has been started (used for entity ids)

useMsaGamertagsOnly.description: Whether the world is restricted to Microsoft Accounts only (no local play).

MultiplayerGame.description: Whether this is a multiplayer game.

MultiplayerGameIntent.description: Whether the world should broadcast multiplayer intents.

XBLBroadcastIntent.description: The visibility of this world via microsoft services.

LANBroadcast.description: Whether the map will LAN broadcast.

LANBroadcastIntent.description: Whether the world should broadcast lan intents.
